scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env node --watch -r dotenv/config index.js"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env node -r dotenv/config index.js
scripts.tables:create:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env node -r dotenv/config src/db/tables.js
scripts.tables:create:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env node -r dotenv/config src/db/tables.js
scripts.seed:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env node -r dotenv/config src/db/seed.js
scripts.seed:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env node -r dotenv/config src/db/seed.js
